pkgmetadata.longdescription: GeoServer REST API R Interface // Provides an R interface to the GeoServer REST API, allowing to upload and publish data in a GeoServer web-application and expose data to OGC Web-Services. The package currently supports all CRUD (Create,Read,Update,Delete) operations on GeoServer workspaces, namespaces, datastores (stores of vector data), featuretypes, layers, styles, as well as vector data upload operations. For more information about the GeoServer REST API, see https://docs.geoserver.org/stable/en/user/rest/.
